This is **Nok the Corrupter**, yelling into the ether to bring you the glorious, gory details of **Week 4 of Tuesday Night Trollball**! If you thought last week was chaotic, you clearly haven't seen what happens when you give heavy weaponry to athletes and tell them the drinks are free! 

We had the highest-scoring game I have ever seen, a parade of humiliations via shutout, and my personal favoriteâ€”**THE EBON GATE CORRUPTORS WINNING!** Let's wade through the viscera, shall we?

## ğŸº THE OPEN BAR INSANITY ğŸº

Someone at the league officeâ€”probably **Yarp** trying to cover a spreadâ€”decided to declare TWO matches as **Open Bar Events**, and the results were absolute bedlam!

**The Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** hosted **The Wyrmwood Stronghammers** in a game that defied logic, sobriety, and physics. The final score was an eye-watering **8 to 7** in favor of the Bizarres! ğŸ¤¯ Folks, that is **15 points** scored by people who could barely walk in a straight line! 

The highlight? **Kristin Kronfeld** of the Bizarres passing the ball TO HERSELF in the endzone for a dunk! Talk about narcissism! **Kython** must be so proud of his glittery little psychopaths. Meanwhile, the Stronghammers fought hard, but maybe **Hamburger Marthe** shouldn't have shoved quite so many beans up his nose before drinking that much ale!

In the other drunken brawl, **The Kerlauger Runeguard** proved they have iron livers to match their iron armor. They marched into the **Desert Spectres'** oven and pitched a **3-0 SHUTOUT**! ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Shepperd Trefler** dunked, **Lorilee Aldred** shot from downtown, and **Reginauld Cordell** managed to injure an opponent while completely wasted! That is functional alcoholism at its finest! The White Ravens should be proud!

1.  **My Ebon Gate Corruptors 2 - Oread's Summit Tamers 0:** HA! VICTORY! **Smith Syst** scored a 2-point screamer, and **Amedeo Bari** polished his boots with the tears of the Tamers! The Corruptors conquer the altitude! ğŸŒ‹

But popularity didn't stop **Dusa Curson** from achieving a **HAT TRICK OF HOSPITALIZATIONS**! ğŸš‘ Three injuries caused by one player! ## ğŸ¤® THE TRAVESTY AT HAVEN ğŸ¤®

I regret to inform you that **The Haven Lights** destroyed **Oak & Onslaught** **5-0**. 

It makes me physically ill to type this. **Tybi Reo** scored twice. **Shiroma Salim** scored. They were flawless. They were efficient. They were boringly perfect. **Sir Artorias** is probably commissioning a statue of himself to celebrate. Gross. Move on!

## ğŸ’° HOSTILE TAKEOVERS & OT THRILLERS ğŸ’°

Finally, we had the **New Prosperity Profits** taking on the **Brimstone Fire Eaters** in the ruins. This one went to **OVERTIME**! â°

It was a grinder! The Fire Eaters fought hard (shoutout to **Nachison Icken** for playing with boots on the wrong feet and still injuring people), but the Guild's money won out in the end. **Aufmann Tedric** hit the game-winning shot in extra time for a **4-2** victory. **Chairman Brennen Farno** can add another win to his ledger, the greedy stiff.

In the only other game, the **Confluence Captains** beat the **New Monteforte Chaos Creatures** **3-1**. The Captains just have too much firepower at home. Sorry, **Dame Terra**, your dirt wizards couldn't stop the cash flow!

---
